value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Look sharp, everybody! Right now,
our top priority is to head to a hot
spring!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|A hot spring? I'll get changed right
away!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Hold it! This isn't a vacation. We're
heading out on a mission!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander Anna... Can you explain,
please?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|In the world where Prince or Princess
Corrin hails from...there's a castle.$k$pIt's a formidable thing, with a large
number of structures—among them,
a bath fed by a hot spring!$k$pThat's where we're headed because
that's where our mission lies.$k$pWe'll break those contracts and
release the Hoshidan and Nohrian
royalty!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|A bath? That sounds a little...private.
Can we really just barge in there?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Alfonse! As the Order of Heroes,
it's our very duty to barge in there!
No more talk. We're heading out!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|You choose to face me here? No
matter how I am dressed, I will
uphold my contract and fight.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|Well done. Please...head to the
remaining baths and help the others.$k$p$Sbs150|
